OrgDeleteRequest.name: OrgDeleteRequest
OrgDeleteRequest.description: Represents a request to delete a developer edition (DE) org.

Name.description: The auto-generated ID of this OrgDeleteRequest object.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who initiated the org delete request.

RequestType.description: Specifies whether you want to deactivate or reactivate the org. When you deactivate an org, you have 30 days to change your mind and reactivate it. After 30 days, the org is locked, and you must contact Salesforce Customer Support to reactivate it. After 60 days, the org is permanently deleted from Salesforce servers.Valid values: Deactivate Reactivate
